title: Room E-Commerce

title: Simple Bank System

title: Starbucks Landing Page
description: My first ever Landing Page project, a copy of starbucks landing page. Developed to learn and understand the basics and fundamental of HTML, CSS and Javasript languages, which greatly helps me in the long run.
